subject: Pedals
description_text: Would the plus x pedals be compatible with a Thrustmaster ts-xw wheel base?

conversations.body_text: Hi Diesel Williams,  Currently, our pedals can only be connected directly to a PC via USB and are not compatible with other brands of wheel bases.

so if i connect separately it will work?

Hi Diesel Williams,  There’s absolutely no issue when connecting it directly to your PC via USB.
